title: cryptoliquor
author: cryptoliquor
content: Hey guys not sure if this is right the right thread to post this on but, what was the forum url that the ledger wallet data leak was on? thanks

comments.author: hZti
comments.body: You can post this in the hardware wallet section, because this is just the general bitcoin discussion. You can find it here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=261.0

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoliquor on December 27, 2022, 02:53:06 PMHey guys not sure if this is right the right thread to post this on but, what was the forum url that the ledger wallet data leak was on? thanksIt was on raidforums, but it's off now. Not sure archive helps much tho
